#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std ;
int main()
{
    int d,m ; cin >> d>>m ;
    int months[7] ;
    months[0]=0;
    months[1]=37;
    months[2]=42+37;
    months[3]=29+42+37;
    months[4]=29+42+37+34;
    months[5]=29+42+37+34+51;
    months[6]=29+42+37+34+51+49;
    int days=months[m-1]+d;
    if(days%6==0){cout << "6" <<endl ;}
    else{
    cout << days%6 << endl ;}
    return  0 ;
}
